languages.text: "Разумная мысль, пришедшая, однако, слишком поздно в твою любопытную голову". {n}Ирлиэт расслабляет руки, открывает глаза и смотрит на вас с осуждением.{/n} "Своего ты добил{mf|ся|ась} — твое шумное присутствие вырвало меня из погружения. Так говори, чего ты хотел{mf||а}?"

"A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your clamorous presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"
languages.original_text: "Разумная мысль, пришедшая, однако, слишком поздно в твою любопытную голову". {n}Ирлиэт расслабляет руки, открывает глаза и смотрит на вас с осуждением.{/n} "Своего ты добил{mf|ся|ась} — твое шумное присутствие вырвало меня из погружения. Так говори, чего ты хотел{mf||а}?"

traits.locale_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your noisy presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your noisy presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"

traits.locale_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your noisy presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"

traits.locale_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your clamorous presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Una idea razonable, aunque tu inquisitiva mente no la haya concebido a su debido tiempo». {n}Yrliet relaja las manos, abre los ojos y te lanza una mirada de desaprobación.{/n} «Ya tienes lo que querías: tu estruendosa presencia me ha sacado de mi inmersión. Dime, ¿a qué has venido?».
languages.original_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your clamorous presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"

traits.locale_text: «Una idea razonable, aunque tu inquisitiva mente no la haya concebido a su debido tiempo». {n}Yrliet relaja las manos, abre los ojos y te lanza una mirada de desaprobación.{/n} «Ya tienes lo que querías: tu ruidosa presencia me ha sacado de mi inmersión. Dime, ¿a qué has venido?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「合理的な考えだが、好奇心旺盛なお前は気づくのが少し遅すぎたようだな」{n}ユリエットは手の力を抜き、目を開き、不服そうにこちらを見た。{/n}「お前のせいだ…お前が騒々しいせいで、我の意識が没入から引き戻されたではないか。なぜここに来た？」
languages.original_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your clamorous presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"

traits.locale_text: 「合理的な考えだが、好奇心旺盛なお前は気づくのが少し遅すぎたようだな」{n}ユリエットは手の力を抜き、目を開き、不服そうにこちらを見た。{/n}「お前のせいだ…お前が騒々しいせいで、我の意識が没入から引き戻されたではないか。なぜここに来た？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这是个合理的想法，但对你那好奇的头脑来说，这个想法来得太迟了。”{n}伊莉耶特松开双手，睁开眼睛，不满地看着你。{/n}“你已经得到了你想要的结果，你的聒噪已经把我从沉浸中拉了出来。告诉我，你为什么来我这里？”
languages.original_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your clamorous presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"

traits.locale_text: “这是个合理的想法，但对你那好奇的头脑来说，这个想法来得太迟了。”{n}伊莉耶特松开双手，睁开眼睛，不满地看着你。{/n}“你已经得到了你想要的结果，你的聒噪已经把我从沉浸中拉了出来。告诉我，你为什么来我这里？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Une pensée raisonnable, mais qui s'est manifestée trop tardivement à votre esprit curieux. » {n}Yrliet relâche ses mains, ouvre les yeux et vous lance un regard désapprobateur.{/n} « Votre présence bruyante m'a tirée de mon immersion. Maintenant que vous avez obtenu ce que vous vouliez, dites-moi donc ce qui vous amène ici. »
languages.original_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your clamorous presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"

traits.locale_text: « Une pensée raisonnable, mais qui s'est manifestée trop tardivement à votre esprit curieux. » {n}Yrliet relâche ses mains, ouvre les yeux et vous lance un regard désapprobateur.{/n} « Votre présence bruyante m'a tirée de mon immersion. Maintenant que vous avez obtenu ce que vous vouliez, dites-moi donc ce qui vous amène ici. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ein vernünftiger Gedanke, auch wenn er Eurem neugierigen Verstand zu spät gekommen ist." {n}Yrliet entspannt ihre Hände, öffnet die Augen und blickt dich missbilligend an.{/n} "Ihr habt bekommen, was Ihr wolltet. Eure lärmende Anwesenheit hat mich aus meiner Immersion gerissen. Also sagt schon, was führt Euch her?"
languages.original_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your clamorous presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein vernünftiger Gedanke, auch wenn er Eurem neugierigen Verstand zu spät gekommen ist." {n}Yrliet entspannt ihre Hände, öffnet die Augen und blickt dich missbilligend an.{/n} "Ihr habt bekommen, was Ihr wolltet. Eure lärmende Anwesenheit hat mich aus meiner Immersion gerissen. Also sagt schon, was führt Euch her?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your clamorous presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"

languages.text: "Mantıklı bir düşünce ama o şüpheci zihninde pek geç yer etti." {n}Yrliet ellerini gevşetiyor. Gözlerini açarak sana kınayıcı bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İstediğine kavuştun işte. Bitmek bilmeyen ısrarcı tavırlarınla beni dalgımdan kopardın. Söyle bakalım, burada ne işin var?"
languages.original_text: "A reasonable thought, but one that occurred too late to your inquisitive mind." {n}Yrliet relaxes her hands, opens her eyes, and looks at you in disapproval.{/n} "You have gotten what you wanted — your clamorous presence has pulled me from my immersion. So tell me, what brings you here?"

traits.locale_text: "Mantıklı bir düşünce ama o şüpheci zihninde pek geç yer etti." {n}Yrliet, ellerini gevşetiyor. Gözlerini açarak sana kınayan bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İstediğine kavuştun işte. Bitmek bilmeyen ısrarcı tavırlarınla beni dalgımdan kopardın. Söyle bakalım, burada ne işin var?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
